REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0967 reute b f BC-BANK-OF-ENGLAND-DRAIN 03-25 0053

TEXT.TITLE: BANK OF ENGLAND DRAINS MONEY MARKET LIQUIDITY
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it drained liquidity from the money market when it sold 167 mln stg of treasury bills due March 27 at rates between 9-9/16 and 10 pct. Earlier, the bank estimated a surplus of around 250 mln stg in the system today. REUTER
